page.title: 13Mortimer Technology
page.content: Based in the country house at Mortimer Hill are:-{Helix:-}(multi-professional services) Was formed in 1976, working in the U.K. and overseas. "We are a multi-discipline consulting firm covering the whole range of building skills".{Mortimer Technology Ltd:-} Concerned with the taking of new ideas and putting them into practice. It started as a separate business in 1982 {Leader Systems Ltd:-}Deals with computer systems: software, support, back-up and hardware.{Intermediate {Technology Development Group Ltd:-} Helps development countries to make good use of their land. It designs the wind pumps that can be seen working at Mortimer Hill Farm. Their work can be seen in thirty different countries all over the world. They are in the sheds near the main house with 30 people working there. It started in 1965.
